column2: "〔Yesterday〕〔Because of ARKS activity here〕〔There are ones〕〔Who are angry〕"
"〔I would〕〔Try to stop them but〕〔They'd likely react to my hubris〕〔And attack me〕"
"〔Or possibly〕〔They are already〕〔Being controlled by Darkers〕"
"〔In that case〕〔I would like you to〕〔Defeat them with out hesitation〕"
"〔Don not worry〕〔Dragonkin are〕〔A perfection of life〕〔We do not simply〕〔Die〕"
"〔That is〕〔We are not only made of flesh〕"

"〔The same〕〔Goes for〕
〔Dragons and ARKS〕
〔As well, correct?〕"
